content.text:
# Prime Context for Claude Code

Use the command `tree` to get an understanding of the project structure.

Start with reading the CLAUDE.md file if it exists to get an understanding of the project.

Read the README.md file to get an understanding of the project.

Read key files in the src/ or root directory

Explain back to me:

- Project structure
- Project purpose and goals
- Key files and their purposes
- Any important dependencies
- Any important configuration files
I'll help you understand the project structure by exploring the codebase. Let me start by examining the project structure and key files.

content.text: Now let me read the CLAUDE.md file (which I can see from the system context) and README.md file:

content.content:
1→# SOL Design System Angular Implementation
     2→![Alt text](./SOL_new_cover.jpg)
     3→
     4→[SOL Components Demo](https://na1.dev.nice-incontact.com/sol/?path=/story/introduction--page)
     5→
     6→---
     7→
     8→## Developer Preview
     9→
    10→### (13.0.x)
    11→
    12→(Versions 13.0.x are considered "Developer Preview" releases. There will be breaking changes between 12.x and 13.0.x, and there will be breaking changes between different 13.0.x releases.)
    13→
    14→---
    15→
    16→## Breaking Changes
    17→
    18→### 12.1.0 - May 2025
    19→
    20→- [breaking] The exported web font is now called "SOL Sans". (CXAPP-27452) If you are using the SOL web font in your own styles, you will need to update them accordingly:
    21→    - – font-family: "<del>Open</del> Sans";
    22→    - + font-family: "<ins>SOL</ins> Sans";
    23→- [breaking] Changed button output:
    24→    - click ➜ buttonClick
    25→
    26→### 11.1.0 - April 2025
    27→
    28→- [deprecated] languageInitializer and languageInitializerProvider have been deprecated; use localeInitializer and languageInitializerProvider in the Translation service instead (CXAPP-27471)
    29→- [breaking] (INLINE NOTIFICATION) Migrate Breeze Embedded message To SOL Inline notification
    30→    - Renamed input property from `title` to `messageTitle`
    31→    - Renamed input property from `message` to `messageData`
    32→    - Renamed input property from `type` to `messageType`
    33→- [breaking] (TOAST NOTIFICATION) Migrate Breeze Toaster To SOL Toastr
    34→    - Renamed toastr service from `SolToastrService` to `ToastrManager`
    35→    - Renamed `customToastrConfig` property to `options`
    36→- [breaking] (WIZARD) Migrate Breeze Wizard To SOL Wizard
    37→    - Renamed output property from `stepData` to `stepChanged` (CXAPP-18955)
    38→- [breaking] (BUTTON TOGGLE) Migrate Breeze Button Toggle To SOL Button Toggle
    39→    - Renamed output property from `change` to `onSelectedChange` (CXAPP-18948)
    40→- [breaking] (SLIDE TOGGLE) Migrate Breeze slide toggle To SOL slide toggle
    41→    - Renamed input property from `checked` to `value`
    42→    - Renamed input property from `id` to `toggleId`
    43→    - Renamed input property from `aria-label` to `ariaLabel`
    44→    - Renamed input property from `aria-labelledby` to `ariaLabelledby`
    45→    - Renamed input property from `aria-describedby` to `ariaDescribedby`
    46→    - Renamed output property from `change` to `checkedChange`
    47→    - Added documentation and migration steps
    48→- [breaking] (ACCORDION)  Migrate Breeze Accordion To SOL Accordion
    49→    - Renamed property in AccordionGroup component from `multi` to `multiple` (CXAPP-18935)
    50→    - Renamed property in AccordionIem component from `title` to `header` (CXAPP-18935)
    51→    - Renamed property in AccordionIem component from `expanded` to `selected` (CXAPP-18935)
    52→    - Renamed property in AccordionIem component from `titleTemplate` to `customHeader` (CXAPP-18935)
    53→    - Renamed property in AccordionIem component from `sectionOpened` to `opened` (CXAPP-18935)
    54→    - Renamed property in AccordionIem component from `sectionClosed` to `closed` (CXAPP-18935)
    55→
    56→
    57→
    58→### 10.1.0 - December 2024
    59→
    60→- [breaking] (SELECTED TAGS) The `variant` input has been removed. (All chips now look like the `basic` variant from V9. The `primary` variant from V9 is no longer available.)
    61→- [breaking] The following components have breaking changes to input names and other configuration options. View the documentation in Storybook, under the Migrating to V10 section under the API page for each component.
    62→    * Button: See Migrating to V10 in Storybook (CXAPP-18936)
    63→    * Numeric Selector: errorMessage (renamed) and buttonType (from boolean to string) (CXAPP-25404)
    64→    * Spinner: showSpinner (renamed) (CXAPP-25528)
    65→    * Text Input: See Migrating to V10 in Storybook (CXAPP-18941, CXAPP-25624)
    66→
    67→### 9.1.0 - August 2024
    68→
    69→- [breaking] If you are importing any CSS files from `node_modules/@niceltd/sol/src/assets`, you will need to change `/assets` to `/styles`. (CXAPP-24266)
    70→- [breaking] The following components have breaking changes to input names and other configuration options. View the documentation in Storybook, under the Migrating to V9 section under the API page for each component.
    71→    * Date Picker (CXAPP-18949, CXAPP-18951)
    72→    * Date Range Picker (CXAPP-18952)
    73→    * Time Picker (CXAPP-18950)
    74→    * Tooltip (CXAPP-18946)
    75→
    76→### 8.1.0 - July 2024
    77→
    78→- [breaking] (DROPDOWN) This component has been rewritten to remove the dependency on `mat-select` from Angular Material. View the documentation in Storybook on the Dropdown > Migrating to V8 page.
    79→- [fixed] (CHIP) Now chip default variant is `basic` and large size chip height increased from 32px to 36px.
    80→
    81→### 7.1.0 - May 2024
    82→
    83→- [breaking] ~~This library now requires AG Grid >=31.0.0 and <31.2.0. You should use (tilde)31.1.0 in your package.json file.~~ As of July 2024, this library supports all known versions AG Grid 31.X. (CXAPP-24336)
    84→- [breaking] (TOOLTIP) Default trigger changed from 'focusin' to 'mouseenter focus' (CXAPP-23809)
    85→
    86→### 6.1.0 - January 2024
    87→- [changed] Now publishing as a scoped package: @niceltd/sol
    88→- [breaking] This library now requires Angular 17, AG Grid 31, and many other dependency upgrades. (CXAPP-22636 / [View upgrade documentation](https://nice-ce-cxone-prod.atlassian.net/l/cp/5EPw9kH4))
    89→
    90→---
    91→
    92→## Figma Source Files
    93→* [SOL Design Tokens](https://www.figma.com/file/0Iw8D7AZhWRQFsKQvqmtm4/Solaris-Styles-(Tokens))
    94→* [SOL Components](https://www.figma.com/file/jJ7ZN5os9PNx0MGWmWfTzV/Sol-Components-(Additional-Info)?node-id=1096-8214&t=hZPbVan7hTHB5xfa-0s)
    95→
    96→## Installation
    97→To run locally SOL components, follow the below steps:
    98→```
    99→npm install
   100→npm run build:lib:debug
   101→```
   102→
   103→## Start the storybook
   104→```
   105→npm run storybook
   106→```
   107→## Steps to integrate SOL components in your project
   108→Please follow detailed [steps](https://na1.dev.nice-incontact.com/sol/?path=/docs/introduction--docs)
   109→
   110→## Changelog
   111→Learn about the latest improvements [changelog](https://github.com/nice-cxone/sol-components/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md).
   112→
   113→## Contributing
   114→
   115→### Contributing Guidelines
   116→You may contribute to the SOL Design System by following the guidelines provided in the below link:
   117→
   118→[Design System Component Guidance](https://nice-ce-cxone-prod.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CXONE/pages/14274869/Design+System+Component+Guidance)
   119→

file.content:
# SOL Design System Angular Implementation
![Alt text](./SOL_new_cover.jpg)

[SOL Components Demo](https://na1.dev.nice-incontact.com/sol/?path=/story/introduction--page)

---

## Developer Preview

### (13.0.x)

(Versions 13.0.x are considered "Developer Preview" releases. There will be breaking changes between 12.x and 13.0.x, and there will be breaking changes between different 13.0.x releases.)

---

## Breaking Changes

### 12.1.0 - May 2025

- [breaking] The exported web font is now called "SOL Sans". (CXAPP-27452) If you are using the SOL web font in your own styles, you will need to update them accordingly:
    - – font-family: "<del>Open</del> Sans";
    - + font-family: "<ins>SOL</ins> Sans";
- [breaking] Changed button output:
    - click ➜ buttonClick

### 11.1.0 - April 2025

- [deprecated] languageInitializer and languageInitializerProvider have been deprecated; use localeInitializer and languageInitializerProvider in the Translation service instead (CXAPP-27471)
- [breaking] (INLINE NOTIFICATION) Migrate Breeze Embedded message To SOL Inline notification
    - Renamed input property from `title` to `messageTitle`
    - Renamed input property from `message` to `messageData`
    - Renamed input property from `type` to `messageType`
- [breaking] (TOAST NOTIFICATION) Migrate Breeze Toaster To SOL Toastr
    - Renamed toastr service from `SolToastrService` to `ToastrManager`
    - Renamed `customToastrConfig` property to `options`
- [breaking] (WIZARD) Migrate Breeze Wizard To SOL Wizard
    - Renamed output property from `stepData` to `stepChanged` (CXAPP-18955)
- [breaking] (BUTTON TOGGLE) Migrate Breeze Button Toggle To SOL Button Toggle
    - Renamed output property from `change` to `onSelectedChange` (CXAPP-18948)
- [breaking] (SLIDE TOGGLE) Migrate Breeze slide toggle To SOL slide toggle
    - Renamed input property from `checked` to `value`
    - Renamed input property from `id` to `toggleId`
    - Renamed input property from `aria-label` to `ariaLabel`
    - Renamed input property from `aria-labelledby` to `ariaLabelledby`
    - Renamed input property from `aria-describedby` to `ariaDescribedby`
    - Renamed output property from `change` to `checkedChange`
    - Added documentation and migration steps
- [breaking] (ACCORDION)  Migrate Breeze Accordion To SOL Accordion
    - Renamed property in AccordionGroup component from `multi` to `multiple` (CXAPP-18935)
    - Renamed property in AccordionIem component from `title` to `header` (CXAPP-18935)
    - Renamed property in AccordionIem component from `expanded` to `selected` (CXAPP-18935)
    - Renamed property in AccordionIem component from `titleTemplate` to `customHeader` (CXAPP-18935)
    - Renamed property in AccordionIem component from `sectionOpened` to `opened` (CXAPP-18935)
    - Renamed property in AccordionIem component from `sectionClosed` to `closed` (CXAPP-18935)



### 10.1.0 - December 2024

- [breaking] (SELECTED TAGS) The `variant` input has been removed. (All chips now look like the `basic` variant from V9. The `primary` variant from V9 is no longer available.)
- [breaking] The following components have breaking changes to input names and other configuration options. View the documentation in Storybook, under the Migrating to V10 section under the API page for each component.
    * Button: See Migrating to V10 in Storybook (CXAPP-18936)
    * Numeric Selector: errorMessage (renamed) and buttonType (from boolean to string) (CXAPP-25404)
    * Spinner: showSpinner (renamed) (CXAPP-25528)
    * Text Input: See Migrating to V10 in Storybook (CXAPP-18941, CXAPP-25624)

### 9.1.0 - August 2024

- [breaking] If you are importing any CSS files from `node_modules/@niceltd/sol/src/assets`, you will need to change `/assets` to `/styles`. (CXAPP-24266)
- [breaking] The following components have breaking changes to input names and other configuration options. View the documentation in Storybook, under the Migrating to V9 section under the API page for each component.
    * Date Picker (CXAPP-18949, CXAPP-18951)
    * Date Range Picker (CXAPP-18952)
    * Time Picker (CXAPP-18950)
    * Tooltip (CXAPP-18946)

### 8.1.0 - July 2024

- [breaking] (DROPDOWN) This component has been rewritten to remove the dependency on `mat-select` from Angular Material. View the documentation in Storybook on the Dropdown > Migrating to V8 page.
- [fixed] (CHIP) Now chip default variant is `basic` and large size chip height increased from 32px to 36px.

### 7.1.0 - May 2024

- [breaking] ~~This library now requires AG Grid >=31.0.0 and <31.2.0. You should use (tilde)31.1.0 in your package.json file.~~ As of July 2024, this library supports all known versions AG Grid 31.X. (CXAPP-24336)
- [breaking] (TOOLTIP) Default trigger changed from 'focusin' to 'mouseenter focus' (CXAPP-23809)

### 6.1.0 - January 2024
- [changed] Now publishing as a scoped package: @niceltd/sol
- [breaking] This library now requires Angular 17, AG Grid 31, and many other dependency upgrades. (CXAPP-22636 / [View upgrade documentation](https://nice-ce-cxone-prod.atlassian.net/l/cp/5EPw9kH4))

---

## Figma Source Files
* [SOL Design Tokens](https://www.figma.com/file/0Iw8D7AZhWRQFsKQvqmtm4/Solaris-Styles-(Tokens))
* [SOL Components](https://www.figma.com/file/jJ7ZN5os9PNx0MGWmWfTzV/Sol-Components-(Additional-Info)?node-id=1096-8214&t=hZPbVan7hTHB5xfa-0s)

## Installation
To run locally SOL components, follow the below steps:
```
npm install
npm run build:lib:debug
```

## Start the storybook
```
npm run storybook
```
## Steps to integrate SOL components in your project
Please follow detailed [steps](https://na1.dev.nice-incontact.com/sol/?path=/docs/introduction--docs)

## Changelog
Learn about the latest improvements [changelog](https://github.com/nice-cxone/sol-components/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md).

## Contributing

### Contributing Guidelines
You may contribute to the SOL Design System by following the guidelines provided in the below link:

[Design System Component Guidance](https://nice-ce-cxone-prod.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CXONE/pages/14274869/Design+System+Component+Guidance)

file.content:
{
  "name": "@niceltd/sol",
  "version": "12.0.0",
  "scripts": {
    "ng": "ng",
    "start": "ng serve ds-showcase --port 4200",
    "build-storybook": "ng run ds-components:build-storybook",
    "build-storybook-prod": "npm run docs:json && ng run ds-components:build-storybook --config-dir ./projects/storybook/.storybook --output-dir ./dist/storybook ",
    "build:lib": "node --version && npm run fetch-tokens && ng build ds-components && npm run copy-sol-tokens && npm run build-storybook-prod",
    "build:lib:debug": "npm run fetch-tokens && ng build ds-components && npm run copy-sol-tokens",
    "fetch-tokens": "cpy node_modules/@niceltd/sol-tokens/sol-tokens.css ./projects/storybook/.storybook/assets",
    "copy-sol-tokens": "node ./scripts/sol-cpy-tokens.js",
    "postbuild:lib": "npm run build-playwright-pageobjects",
    "postbuild:lib:debug": "npm run build-playwright-pageobjects",
    "build-playwright-pageobjects": "node node_modules/@niceltd/cxone-playwright-test-utils/corral-playwright-pageobjects.js projects/ds-components tmp && node ./scripts/update-page-object-imports-v2.js && node node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc --project tsconfig.playwright.json",
    "test:lib:single": "ng test ds-components --code-coverage --watch=false --karma-config ./projects/ds-components/karma.conf.js && npm run test:schematics",
    "test:lib": "ng test ds-components --code-coverage --watch=true",
    "test:ghworkflow": "ng build ds-components && npm run test:lib:single",
    "docs:json": "compodoc -p ./tsconfig.json -e json -d ./projects/storybook",
    "storybook": "ng run ds-components:storybook",
    "storybook:buildlib": "npm run build:lib:debug && npm run docs:json && npm run storybook",
    "format": "npx prettier ./projects/**/*.{js,ts,html,css,scss} ./e2e/**/*.{js,ts,html,css,scss} --write",
    "format-check": "npx prettier ./projects/**/*.{js,ts,html,css,scss} --check",
    "build:change-log": "(cat changelog-template-start.html && node_modules/.bin/marked CHANGELOG.md && cat changelog-template-end.html) > ",
    "e2e-suite_01": "npx playwright install chromium && npx playwright test --config=e2e/suite01/suite01.config.ts",
    "e2e-suite_02": "npx playwright install chromium && npx playwright test --config=e2e/suite02/suite02.config.ts",
    "e2e-suite_03": "npx playwright install chromium && npx playwright test --config=e2e/suite03/suite03.config.ts",
    "e2e-suite_04": "npx playwright install chromium && npx playwright test --config=e2e/suite04/suite04.config.ts",
    "e2e-suite_05": "npx playwright install chromium && npx playwright test --config=e2e/suite05/suite05.config.ts",
    "e2e-suite_01:local": "npx playwright install chromium && npx playwright test --config=e2e/suite01/suite01.config.ts --headed",
    "lint": "",
    "lint:code": "eslint ./projects --ext .js,.ts --fix --quiet",
    "lint:styles": "npx stylelint \"projects/**/*.{css,scss,sass}\"",
    "test:schematics": "npm run schematics:build && jasmine --config=jasmine-schematics.json",
    "schematics:build": "npx rimraf dist/sol/schematics && npx tsc -p tsconfig.schematics.json",
    "build:schematics": "npm run schematics:build",
    "postschematics:build": "npm run schematics:copy:schemas && npm run schematics:copy:files && npm run schematics:copy:collection",
    "schematics:copy:schemas": "(cd projects && npx copyfiles schematics/**/schema.json ../dist/sol/)",
    "schematics:copy:files": "(cd projects && npx copyfiles -R schematics/*/files/** ../dist/sol/)",
    "schematics:copy:collection": "npx copyfiles -f projects/schematics/collection.json dist/sol/schematics"
  },
  "private": true,
  "dependencies": {
    "@angular-devkit/schematics-cli": "^17.3.4",
    "@angular/animations": "^17.3.8",
    "@angular/cdk": "^17.3.8",
    "@angular/common": "^17.3.8",
    "@angular/compiler": "^17.3.8",
    "@angular/core": "^17.3.8",
    "@angular/forms": "^17.3.8",
    "@angular/material": "^17.3.8",
    "@angular/platform-browser": "^17.3.8",
    "@angular/platform-browser-dynamic": "^17.3.8",
    "@angular/router": "^17.3.8",
    "@aws-sdk/client-secrets-manager": "^3.345.0",
    "@schematics/angular": "^17.3.4",
    "ag-grid-angular": "~31.0.0",
    "ag-grid-community": "~31.0.0",
    "ag-grid-enterprise": "~31.0.0",
    "ng2-nouislider": "^2.0.0",
    "ngx-toastr": "^18.0.0",
    "nouislider": "^15.7.0",
    "rxjs": "^7.8.0",
    "tippy.js": "^6.3.7",
    "tslib": "^2.3.0",
    "zone.js": "~0.14.2"
  },
  "devDependencies": {

content.text:
Based on my exploration of the codebase, here's a comprehensive overview:

# SOL Design System Angular Implementation

## Project Structure

This is an **Angular component library monorepo** that implements the SOL (Solaris) Design System for CXone. The project uses ng-packagr for building and distributes as `@niceltd/sol`.

### Main Projects Architecture:
- **`projects/ds-components/`** - Core component library (published as @niceltd/sol)
- **`projects/ds-showcase/`** - Demo application for testing components  
- **`projects/storybook/`** - Storybook documentation and stories
- **`projects/schematics/`** - Angular CLI schematics for migration and scaffolding

## Project Purpose and Goals

The SOL Design System provides:
- **Consistent UI components** across CXone applications
- **Angular 17 compatibility** with Material Design integration
- **Comprehensive testing** (unit tests with Karma/Jasmine, E2E with Playwright)
- **Design token integration** from Figma
- **Migration tools** via Angular schematics
- **Internationalization support** with translation services

## Key Files and Their Purposes

### Root Configuration:
- **`angular.json`** - Angular workspace configuration with storybook integration
- **`package.json`** - Main project dependencies and npm scripts (line 3-164)
- **`CLAUDE.md`** - Development guidance and command reference
- **`README.md`** - Breaking changes documentation and setup instructions

### Component Architecture:
Each component follows this structure:
```
component-name/
├── index.ts (barrel export)
├── ng-package.json (packaging config)  
├── public_api.ts (public exports)
└── src/lib/
    ├── component-name.component.ts (main component)
    ├── component-name.component.html (template)
    ├── component-name.component.scss (styles)
    ├── component-name.component.spec.ts (tests)
    ├── component-name.module.ts (Angular module)
    ├── component-name.page.ts (Playwright page object)
    └── component-name.stories.ts (Storybook stories)
```

### Key Source Directories:
- **`projects/ds-components/src/styles/`** - Global styles, design tokens, theme files
- **`projects/ds-components/src/utils/`** - Shared utilities (date formatting, ID generation, DOM utils)
- **`projects/ds-components/src/assets/`** - Fonts (SOL Sans/Open Sans), strings, SVG assets
- **`e2e/`** - Playwright E2E tests organized in 5 suites
- **`tmp/pageobjects/`** - Auto-generated Playwright page objects

## Important Dependencies

### Core Framework:
- **Angular 17.3.8** with Material Design integration
- **AG Grid 31.x** for data grid components
- **RxJS 7.8.0** for reactive programming

### Testing & Documentation:
- **Playwright 1.50.1** for E2E testing
- **Storybook 8.0.6** for component documentation
- **Karma/Jasmine** for unit testing

### Build Tools:
- **ng-packagr 17.0.3** for library packaging
- **TypeScript 5.2.2**
- **ESLint** with CXone configuration

### Design System Integration:
- **@niceltd/sol-tokens 1.8.0** - Design tokens from Figma
- **tippy.js 6.3.7** - Tooltip functionality
- **ngx-toastr 18.0.0** - Toast notifications

## Important Configuration Files

- **`tsconfig.json`** - TypeScript configuration
- **`projects/ds-components/karma.conf.js`** - Unit test configuration  
- **`e2e/suite0X/suiteXX.config.ts`** - Playwright E2E test configurations (5 suites)
- **`projects/schematics/collection.json`** - Angular schematics configuration
- **`figma-tokens/solaris.tokens-jul-19-22.json`** - Design tokens from Figma

The project is currently in **version 12.0.0** with developer preview releases (13.0.x) that include breaking changes. It includes comprehensive breaking change documentation and migration guides for each major version update.
